about-section.label: About the community
about-section.title: Ta’shilul ‘ilmi palu community
about-section.description:
The Ta’shil Ilmi Palu community is a community formed to accommodate learning related to the foundations of Shariah Sciences by studying the books of the ulama in a structured manner. 
This community is open to the brothers, anyone who wants to learn the foundations of syar'i science.

rule-section.title: Rules
rules: Commit to the program sincerely for the sake of Allah and be earnest (serious)
This program is only for brothers who are serious and committed to the learning process. Attendance is MANDATORY
Bring a notebook and pen for taking notes
Maintain proper manners during study sessions
Maintain good relationships with teachers, fellow students, and organizers
Follow venue rules, and keep order and cleanliness during the program

note.title: Important Note
note.body: If you're unable to commit seriously, you may still join the study sessions but only with the status of mustafid (beneficiary).
